My favorite meal in Barcelona.  Outstandingly devoid of tourists.  Perfect lighting and decor.  I don't recall the names of what we had and couldn't find an online English menu, but there's a tuna dish on the medium size menu which comes out with a dome of smoke.  While you think it could be smoke in mirrors, it's not (if you like shishimi style tuna).  I highly recommend calling for reservations.  This place is tiny.
